titles.title: Medical Innovation Never Stops Act of 2019

To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to allow, during a lapse in appropriations, acceptance of certain device submissions and registrations with the corresponding fees made available for obligation and expenditure for the process for the review of device applications, and for other purposes.
Medical Innovation Never Stops Act of 2019

bill.summary:
Medical Innovation Never Stops Act of 2019
This bill requires the Food and Drug Administration (FDA)to accept and review new medical device applications and associated user fees during a lapse in appropriations.Under current law, the FDA is prohibited from accepting new user fees and reviewing medical device submissions during an appropriations lapse.
